text:
<!here>
FAILURES IN ONBOARDING NEW VALIDATORS TO DEVNET

Splice 0.4.8 introduced an error in the Canton topology management code that adds an excess (quadratic) increase in topology state entries.

This very large increase in topology state causes the onboarding process to stall for new Validator nodes attempting to onboard to DevNet.

The Splice and Canton teams have identified the root cause and are collaborating to implement a fix.

In the meantime, we suggest that you don't attempt to onboard any new nodes to DevNet until further notice. The Splice and Canton teams will work with the Super Validators to determine how quickly a fix can be rolled out, and we'll announce here as soon as we know.

text: Splice release 0.4.7 is ready for deployment on TestNet

text.text:
:tada: Splice release `0.4.7` is ready for deployment on TestNet, and is available from the GSF
:ship: ⅔ of Super Validator nodes have upgraded to this release, including the GSF Super Validator node
*SV node status here*: <https://sync.global/sv-network>
*Release notes here*: <https://docs.test.sync.global/release_notes.html>
